page.title: 11TOURISM
page.content: SHELDON VILLAGE AND THE SURROUNDING AREA IS MAINLY POPULAR FOR HIKERS, WALKERS etc. THE MAIN ATTRACTION APART FROM THE BEAUTIFUL SCENERY OF FIELDS AND TREES ARE THE OLD LEAD MINES KNOWN AS MAGPIE MINE THIS IS OF GREAT HISTORICAL INTEREST AND THE MAGNIFICENT CHURCH IN SHELDON VILLAGE. OCCASIONALLY PEOPLE PASS THROUGH SHELDON IN CARS OR ON BICYCLES JUST OUT OF CURIOSITY. OUR FIRST SHELDON DAY IN JULY 1984 ATTRACTED MANY PEOPLE BOTH LOCAL AND TOURISTS.THIS YEAR WE AGAIN ADVERTISED IN A WIDE AREA AND HAD MANY TOURISTS COME TO OUR VILLAGE FETE DAY.
